Vanilla Historical Sight Presets V1.4

/Changelog
Fine-tuned and renamed many presets, and added two new presets. Oplot, DefaultPlus2.

/Explanation
Replicate the historical GPS or FCS look of tanks using the sights provided in War Thunder.

Sight thickness, font size, color, transparency, layout, crosshairs, which cannot be adjusted within the game, have been adjusted.

There are 25 sight presets, mainly for MBT and IFV.
Includes all presets from previous version.

This preset was created to replicate historical sights but with an emphasis on practical...

Guilty as charged, but damn it, it ain't right.

No. 24

The last gunsight of 2025! (or the first gunsight of 2026 for those who live anywhere outside the USA lol). Merry Christmas and Happy new year to all!

Description: A T-72 / PSO-like gunsight with some reused elements from the earlier Top tier 4.0x-12.0x zoom futuristic sight I made this year, combining my favorite elements of my favorite sights I've made across the span of 2025.

Bonus Drawing: Album cover of Ride The Lightning made by Metallica (1984)

Best Used: For <b...

For all that ratty vehicles :3

By faniniiiiyan on instagram
